data.message: This guy donates millions of dollars, and all this campaign is asking for is $10, $25, or $50 from your average joe. People blow that every day on smokes, liquor, and drugs. And all of you commenters have the gall to say that he is being greedy and he should do it all himself? Wake the fuck up.

replies.message: Well said bro. Not to mention when we go to the theater and easily blow 40-50 bucks on sodas n popcorn.
Even if everyone on this comment thread donated ONE dollar, that would be a huge impact for those in need. People are idiots.
Clarke gets it!
Nathan Farren

I totally agree with the message, but understand what he is asking. It's  $25 per backpack for 5,500 people. If, like you said, he gives millions... this is a drop in that bucket. It is 137,000. It's a drop in the bucket considering. 

And let's be real, his fans aren't rich or well off. At least not the majority. He has more money than all of the commenters in this thread combined. 

But still, people should give where they can.
